item.title: Billie Eilish, Nicki Minaj, Jon Bon Jovi and over 200 artists call for protections against “predatory use of AI” - CNBC
item.description:
1. Billie Eilish, Nicki Minaj, Jon Bon Jovi and over 200 artists call for protections against “predatory use of AI”  CNBC
  2. Billie Eilish, Nicki Minaj, Katy Perry, Camila Cabello Sign Open Letter Warning About AI Threat to Artists  Hollywood Reporter
  3. Music Industry Confronts AI Compensation Issue  PYMNTS.com
  4. “Some of the biggest and most powerful companies are, without permission, using our work to train AI models...This assault on human creativity must be stopped”: Pearl Jam, The Cure, R.E.M. attack “predatory” use of AI in music  Louder
  5. Researchers seek to ‘poison’ art so AI platforms can’t copy it  NBC News
